extendedInfo.description: Want to learn algebra? Algebra is used every day in any profession and chances are, youâll run into algebra problems throughout your life! Any of the following sound familiar?- Trouble paying attention in class- Improper instruction- General disinterest in mathDonât worry! Come finals day, youâll be prepared with our comprehensive algebra app. Our app features everything youâll need to learn algebra, from an all-inclusive algebra textbook to a number of procedural problem generators to cement your knowledge.Features:- Abridged algebra textbook, covering many aspects of the subject- Procedural problem generators, ensuring you will not encounter the same problem twice- Problem explanations, demonstrating step-by-step how to do each problem- Quicknotes, reviewing entire chapters in minutes- Intuitive graphing interface, teaching proper graphing methods- Statistics tracking, helping you identify your weaknesses Plus, new chapters are added all the time!Subjects covered:Ch. 1: Basics1.1 Basics of Algebra1.2 Solving Equations1.3 Solving Inequalities1.4 Ratios and Proportions1.5 Exponents1.6 Negative Exponents1.7 Scientific NotationCh. 2: Graphing2.1 Rectangular Coordinate System2.2 Graphing by Points2.3 Graphing by Slope_Intercept Form2.4 Graphing by Point_Slope Form2.5 Parallel and Perpendicular Lines2.6 Introduction to FunctionsCh. 3: Systems3.1 Systems of Equations by Substitution3.2 Systems of Equations by Elimination3.3 Systems of Equations by GraphingCh. 4: Polynomials4.1 Introduction to Polynomials4.2 Adding and Subtracting Polynomials4.3 Multiplying Polynomials4.4 Dividing PolynomialsCh. 5: Rationals5.1 Simplifying Rational Expressions5.2 Multiplying and Dividing Rational Expressions5.3 Adding and Subtracting Rational Expressions5.4 Complex Rational Expressions5.5 Solving Rational Expressions Ch. 6: Factoring6.1 Introduction to Factoring6.2 Factoring Trinomials6.3 Factoring Binomials6.4 Solving Equations by FactoringCh. 7: Radicals7.1 Introduction To Radicals7.2 Simplifying Radical Expressions7.3 Adding and Subtracting Radical Expressions7.4 Multiplying and Dividing Radical Expressions7.5 Rational Exponents7.6 Solving Radical ExpressionsCh. 8: Quadratics8.1 Extracting Square Roots8.2 Completing the Square8.3 Quadratic Formula8.4 Graphing ParabolasKeywords: learn algebra, algebra, math, free, graphing, algebra textbook, teach algebra, algebra tutor, algebra practice, algebra problems, review algebra, study algebra, algebra prep, algebra cheat sheet, algebra formulas, algebra notes, algebra quicknotes, pre-algebra, algebra 2, common core, high school math, high school algebra, ged, sat, gmat

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: If u want to learn algebra..this thing is for u......explained in such a manner that anybody can understand....
reviews.author: Balraj Brar

reviews.title: Best interactive math app
reviews.comment: fun and wasy way to learn. thanks. only thing im missing is a quiz on the accompanied text. many words there are important to remember and understand. and a quiz would make it easier to memorize. also the app is unstable, when reading a chapter it will go out of the chapter at random. so i have to go in and  scroll down where i left off. anyhow, would love more math and chemistry apps like this, I would pay for it too. you get to practice what you learned!!!
reviews.author: Torulv Gjedrem

reviews.title: Great math app!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome because the lessons are pragmatic and give great explanations for each step.  Only thing to be desired is for there to be space on the screen to write the formulas out,  or to do the work to solve a problem.
reviews.author: christian rodriguez

reviews.title: Excellent but some mistakes inducing errors
reviews.comment: Program is very good, could use a bit more details or methods. Also what i found wrong is often it will tell you have the wrong answer when you dont. Example: answer is : \"x = -2\" , it will tell you are wrong and claim answer is \"x = -2/1\" now obiously that is incorrect i believe as both have the same value and there\'s no point in putting 1 as a denominator. Hopefully they can fix those type of glitches in the future. Thanks!
reviews.author: Matias Toro

reviews.title: Good learning tool.
reviews.comment: Unfortunately, it crashes from the lesson I\'m working on back to the main selection screen about every two minutes. Very annoying.
reviews.author: Edward De Haven

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.comment: Great that it keeps your  practice score average so you can track your progress and that it gives ti u the steps to the correct answer.
reviews.author: Jody K Waddell

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Crystal Shue

reviews.title: Awesome....
reviews.comment: My kid finally understands basic algebra. Keep it up defernatly with donating to this cause and sharing it with others
reviews.author: Mark Fruhauf

reviews.title: Ummm
reviews.comment: I did lesson 1.a and it marked two questions wrong although I know for a fact they were right and the explanation also says it was right...:-/  the lesson also contained simple grammatical errors.
reviews.author: J Bisch

reviews.title: I\'m glad I got this!
reviews.comment: This algebra app\' is a  true piece of quality and an asset to have on my phone. This will NOT be going in the trashcan, ever!

reviews.title: Pretty easy to use.

reviews.comment: I love it. I really learned from. Its worth buying. I\'m now ready for my Algebra 1 course!

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I never could get the hang of algebra even when I began college. After deciding to get ready for college again after quitting, I decided to learn algebra really well before college courses began and I can finally say im learning it well thanks to this app! Worth it worth it
